Title: Blue's Big Holiday
Plot: It's the holidays in the Blue's Clues neighborhood and we're getting together some great gifts, as well as creating patches for a memory quilt. In the Blue Skiddoo segment, we pick out the perfect gifts for some of Blue's friends. Later, we deliver them and learn all about various holiday traditions. In the process, we also receive several great patches for the quilt.
Writer: Alice Wilder, Angela Santomero, Michael T. Smith
GuestStars: Tyrese Gibson, Malik Horton, Nicole Gibson, Monique Reilly, P.J. Battisti, Lisa Datz, Wynonna Judd, Amanda Murray, Michelle Markandt
